page.title: 15TRANSPORT AROUND FROXFIELD 2
page.content: The passengers have to pay the same as a normal Bus Service would charge. Part of the cost of running the bus is subsidised by the council. It runs 5 days a week at collection times, all year round.As it is used by roughly the same people each week, the drivers get to know who uses it, and so can pick them up, however it can be waved down. When the bus breaks down, or has an accident, it is replaced by a spare, shared between Petworth and Petersfield. The Post Bus provides a vital service to the community; it will last as long as it is required.
